name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GRE Genius - Learn GRE Vocab w/o Even Trying

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn GRE Vocab w/o Even Trying

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Master GRE vocab without even thinking about studying.

GRE Genius integrates GRE words into your everyday reading so you can focus less on studying & more on learning words in context

"Before studying with GRE Genius, I felt pretty stupid. After studying with GRE Genius, I felt asinine, inept, and inane! Yet somehow I increased my score 10 points - guess I'm a little more sagacious than I thought :)" - Sarah Z., PhD Candidate - CS @ Harvard University

"The GRE sucks. As a non-native English speaker, the GRE majorly sucks! But seriously, GRE Genius made studying suck way less, and I improved my verbal reasoning score from 153 to 168!" - Lorenzo L., Grad Student - AI @ UC Berkeley

"GRE vocab made easy! As a working mom, it was hard to find time to study for the GRE. Since my daughter didn't make the best study partner (teaching a 5 year old words like aberrant backfired when she started creating new insults for her classmates), I had to find a better study method. Thanks to GRE Genius, I improved 12 points in my verbal reasoning score, and I hardly felt like I was studying. You have to check this out!" - Kelly R., Product Manager @ Google, incoming MBA @ Stanford GSB
